note: 🇨🇴 Autodidact. Thinking out-loud about Free software, privacy, Football & Rock music.
name: Andrés Cárdenas

content.html:
I’ve been testing the waters of the Fediverse on and off since learning about the IndieWeb. I’ve tried a couple of Mastodon instances, syndicating to Bridgy + Fed and more recently a @micro.blog account.

With the recent increase in activity thanks to pElon, I’ve finally settled on a main ActivityPub profile: @kandr3s@kandr3s.co 

But until I can send “following activities" from GoBlog I signed up for an account @indieweb.social to follow all the interesting people I come across on the Fediverse and read them via RSS feed.

For the first time since joining I did an #introduction. I’m hoping to interact with more people on the open web and eventually move the whole operation to a single profile 🤞 the IndieWeb way.
content.value: I’ve been testing the waters of the Fediverse on and off since learning about the IndieWeb. I’ve tried a couple of Mastodon instances, syndicating to Bridgy + Fed and more recently a @micro.blog account.With the recent increase in activity thanks to pElon, I’ve finally settled on a main ActivityPub profile: @kandr3s@kandr3s.co But until I can send “following activities" from GoBlog I signed up for an account @indieweb.social to follow all the interesting people I come across on the Fediverse and read them via RSS feed.For the first time since joining I did an #introduction. I’m hoping to interact with more people on the open web and eventually move the whole operation to a single profile 🤞 the IndieWeb way.

content.html: For anyone following this feed sorry if it’s been (and will be) spammy. We also run tests on production here just so we can walk on the wild side… 😅

content.html: Hey 👋 @manton, is it possible to post from Micro.blog to Micropub on the web? The iOS app supports posting via Micropub, but I couldn’t find the option on the web. Perhaps it is a paid feature?
content.value: Hey 👋 @manton, is it possible to post from Micro.blog to Micropub on the web? The iOS app supports posting via Micropub, but I couldn’t find the option on the web. Perhaps it is a paid feature?

content.html:
Ah, the joy that’s coming to this little, authentic Latino corner in Warsaw with take-out empanadas and Salsa music on the weekends. Macondo Bar Latino gets it.

Unlike all those insulting “colombian” restaurants around the world that take some inspiration from Escobar, they took the name from One Hundred Years of Solitude, a book a wise man once told me “needs to be read once every year.” Macondo is not just the fictional village on which the story takes place, it’s Colombia as imagined by author Gabriel García Márquez.

Seriously, if anyone sees this, please never go to any restaurant inspired by a narco. Anyone who thinks that’s creative or even okay can go to hell.

At Macondo Bar they have Bandeja Paisa (how do they even get such good plátanos here in Poland? I want in 😅) I love the empanadas and I’m going for patacones next…
content.value: Ah, the joy that’s coming to this little, authentic Latino corner in Warsaw with take-out empanadas and Salsa music on the weekends. Macondo Bar Latino gets it.Unlike all those insulting “colombian” restaurants around the world that take some inspiration from Escobar, they took the name from One Hundred Years of Solitude, a book a wise man once told me “needs to be read once every year.” Macondo is not just the fictional village on which the story takes place, it’s Colombia as imagined by author Gabriel García Márquez.Seriously, if anyone sees this, please never go to any restaurant inspired by a narco. Anyone who thinks that’s creative or even okay can go to hell.At Macondo Bar they have Bandeja Paisa (how do they even get such good plátanos here in Poland? I want in 😅) I love the empanadas and I’m going for patacones next…

content.html: Imagine paying $700 USD (Roon lifetime license) for a music player and not being able to listen to any of your local music files whenever your Internet goes down… 😂 #justaudiophilethings
content.value: Imagine paying $700 USD (Roon lifetime license) for a music player and not being able to listen to any of your local music files whenever your Internet goes down… 😂 #justaudiophilethings

name: 🍿 Watched: The Internet’s Own Boy: The Story of Aaron Swartz, 2014

content.html: It seems that with the recent improvements to ActivityPub support one can use Micro.blog as a Fediverse instance, Micropub client and Feed reader. How cool is that?! It’s certainly the most convenient “IndieWeb timeline” on mobile.
content.value: It seems that with the recent improvements to ActivityPub support one can use Micro.blog as a Fediverse instance, Micropub client and Feed reader. How cool is that?! It’s certainly the most convenient “IndieWeb timeline” on mobile.

content.html:
If there’s no custom domain, what does the Mastodon-compatible username look like? @username@micro.blog of course! In this way, Micro.blog looks a lot more like another Mastodon instance, but an instance that also has a full suite of blogging features, IndieWeb protocols, and everything else we’ve been building for years.

I abandoned my barely active account on birdsite recently and I was giving the Fosstodon instance a try, but I’ve been cross-posting from my IndieWebsite to M.b for a while now. Micro.blog is offering (including free users like me) a great opportunity to bridge 3 communities together. This is game changer.
content.value: If there’s no custom domain, what does the Mastodon-compatible username look like? @username@micro.blog of course! content.html: Once you GoBlog, you never go back. Thank you for all the improvements, Jan-Lukas.

content.html: Have you met Billy Evąs? 😄

El Mixtape was originally meant to be shared monthly, but as life gets busy and (once again) has to be post-poned, I notice it turns more personal, natural, and I’m hoping, polished. I like the idea of a switch from monthly to “when is ready”

https://tintaenlascintas.com
